thread.title: San Marino’s J.P. Shohfi voted SoCal Prep Legends boys athlete of the week
thread.title_full: San Marino’s J.P. Shohfi voted SoCal Prep Legends boys athlete of the week

title: San Marino’s J.P. Shohfi voted SoCal Prep Legends boys athlete of the week
text:
SoCal Prep Legends Boys Athlete of the Week
Name: J.P. Shohfi
School: San Marino
Year: Senior
Sport: Football
Winning Numbers: San Marino receiver J.P. Shohfi was voted the SoCal Prep Legends boys athlete of the week with 4,730 votes to beat out second-place finisher Taz Tauaese of El Segundo, who finished with 2,480 votes. Shohfi helped the undefeated Titans, ranked second in the CIF Southern Section Central Division poll, end Monrovia’s 38-game Rio Hondo League winning streak with a convincing 49-14 victory. Shohfi scored three touchdowns. The first came on a 35-yard pass from quarterback Carson Glazier, the second on a 7-yard run and the last on a 66-yard punt return. With the win, San Marino improved to 7-0 and beat Monrovia for the first time since 2003.
NOTE : The best athletes in Southern California will be honored at an end-of-the-school-year awards show. For more details visit socalpreplegends.com , where you can also vote for the SoCal Athletes of the Week, as well as Play of the Week.
Final Tally
SGVN : J.P. Shohfi, San Marino, 4730 Votes (54.4%)
Long Beach Press Telegram : Sean McGrew, St. John Bosco, 39 Votes (0.4%)
L.A. Daily News : Ladell Atkins, El Camino Real, 4 Votes (1.1%)
Daily Breeze: Taz Tauaese, El Segundo, 2480 Votes (28.5%)
Daily Bulletin: Nathan Tilford, Upland, 445 Votes (5.1%)
San Bernardino Sun : Marcus Strong, Carter, 36 Votes (0.4%)
Redlands Daily Facts : Xolan Brown, Redlands, 878 Votes (10.1%)
